title: Ancient Civilizations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/20/18
itunes:title: Ancient Civilizations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/20/18
description:
George Noory and researcher Mark Carlotto examine his evidence of ancient civilizations that existed on Earth thousands of years ago before the mythical city of Atlantis, and whether humans may actually be descendants of settlers from Mars.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
